scripts.build:dev: rm -rf dist/ | mkdir dist | cp public/index.html dist/ & cp public/styles.css dist/ & elm make src/Main.elm --debug --output=dist/app.js
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf dist/ | mkdir dist | cp public/index.html dist & cp public/styles.css dist & elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=dist/app.js
